title: New: The Casual Tuesday – Seatbelt
body: One of my most anticipated album releases of 2013 is from Oklahoma’s **Tallows**, having put out a couple of demos toward the end of last year, paired with an electrifying live show at SXSW, their melodic take on late 90’s Americana infused pop-punk is not too dissimilar to Dallas four piece **The Casual Tuesday**. Whilst appearing to be still in their teens (I say that purely based upon photographs, apologies), their lyrical and songwriting capabilities far outshine their apparently modest years. New track _Seatbelt_ is their first new recorded material in quite some time, and shows off an early **Death Cab For Cutie** inspired side to the group, slightly gritty, yet carefully pieced together indie pop. Opening with the gorgeous line “_We’re two stones falling towards the same sea / either to shatter or shink / we’ll see; please breathe_“, these are kids with true talent, and are more than worthy of your ears for a few minutes. Seatbelt by The Casual Tuesday
